short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inscribe inscriptions, store your inscriptions and rare Satoshi in the Open Source Chrome wallet for Ordinals!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
- Store and transfer your Ordinals 
- 100% Open-source (GitHub)
- Quickly inscribe (mint) Ordinals NFTs without running a fullnode
- Store and transfer you BRC-20s
- Store and transfer you rare Satoshis

CloverPool Wallet is a reliable browser extension wallet that makes it safe & easy for you to store, send and receive bitcoins , Ordinals and rare Satoshis on bitcoin blockchain. 

CloverPool Wallet is a non-custodial wallet. We never have access to your funds. CloverPool Wallet never stores your seed phrase, your password or any private information. Your accounts are derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase.

CloverPool Wallet is 100% Open-source! 

- CloverPool Wallet is a hierarchical deterministic wallet. Your accounts are derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase.
- Your private keys are encrypted on your device by your password and are never shared with anyone.
- CloverPool Wallet doesn't track any personal identifiable information, your account addresses, or asset balances.
- Users can import accounts from single private keys. These accounts are not derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase and will be labelled as “imported”.
- Supports displaying and transferring Ordinals
- Supports displaying and transferring rare Satoshis
